introduction: Hello! I am Lucas (aka. lucmsilva/eleu), and this is my website.

pix: You can also donate via Pix!
pix-desc: If you live in Brazil (or have a Brazilian bank account), you can scan this QR Code in your bank app to make the donation (or copy the key using the button below)
pix-alert:
Pix key copied to clipboard successfully!
Open your bank app and paste the key there to make the donation.
